Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2010 06:40PM momofgrls2 wrote: I just encountered this with my friend today.  Her machine comes with a lancet pen that you change the tip on so that you can test on your thigh or arm.  I know that you said no to the arm, but the thigh may work.  With this it has a little "suction cup" top and you put it on the site and move it up and down to creat a "suction" like action and than press to prick.  Another article I just read said in stead of using the middle of your fingers use the sides.  There are more blood vessels there and the nerves are less painless there.  The name of the machine my friend has is accucheck compact  plus and the pen comes with it. Maybe you can just order the pen through them.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: diabetic/pricking finger Halah Halah
